alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 12 at 9:04PM CDT until March 21 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi...Arkansas...Tennessee...Missouri... Mississippi River at Tunica Mhoon Landing Mississippi River Above Tiptonville Mississippi River at Osceola Mississippi River at Caruthersville For the Lower Mississippi River...including Tiptonville, Caruthersville, Osceola, Memphis, Tunica Mhoon Landing, Helena... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY, MARCH 21... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Osceola. * WHEN...Until Monday, March 21. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, In Tennessee, Nix road is flooded. Major sections of Four Mile Road are flooded. Snyder Bluff and northern Sam Taylor Roads are flooding. Sunk Lake Road is covered north of Bee Lake. Fields on Morgan Point are flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 30.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CST Saturday was 30.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday, March 20 and continue falling to 13.2 feet Saturday, April 02. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
